bug.short_desc: Generator bombs on Legal this.tr() Call

long_desc.thetext:
Here is the snipett which trigger the error
invalidFields.push( this.tr( this.tr( "Associate" ) + "[" + index + "]" ) );
and the stacktrace
-Traceback (most recent call last): File "/Users/dreux_b/project/chaire/ifsr/presentation/target/qooxdoo-sdk/tool/bin/generator.py", line 243, in <module> main() File "/Users/dreux_b/project/chaire/ifsr/presentation/target/qooxdoo-sdk/tool/bin/generator.py", line 226, in main generatorObj.run() File "/Users/dreux_b/project/chaire/ifsr/presentation/target/qooxdoo-sdk/tool/pylib/generator/Generator.py", line 498, in run self.runUpdateTranslation() File "/Users/dreux_b/project/chaire/ifsr/presentation/target/qooxdoo-sdk/tool/pylib/generator/Generator.py", line 1268, in runUpdateTranslation self._locale.updateTranslations(namespace, lib.translationPathSuffix(), locales) File "/Users/dreux_b/project/chaire/ifsr/presentation/target/qooxdoo-sdk/tool/pylib/generator/action/Locale.py", line 175, in updateTranslations pot = self.getPotFile(classList) # pot: translation keys from the source code File "/Users/dreux_b/project/chaire/ifsr/presentation/target/qooxdoo-sdk/tool/pylib/generator/action/Locale.py", line 117, in getPotFile strings = self.getPackageStrings(content, variants) File "/Users/dreux_b/project/chaire/ifsr/presentation/target/qooxdoo-sdk/tool/pylib/generator/action/Locale.py", line 388, in getPackageStrings translation, cached = self._classesObj[classId].messageStrings(variants) File "/Users/dreux_b/project/chaire/ifsr/presentation/target/qooxdoo-sdk/tool/pylib/generator/code/clazz/MClassI18N.py", line 66, in messageStrings raise RuntimeError("Could not extract message strings from %s!\n%s" % (self.id, detail)) RuntimeError: Could not extract message strings from ifsr.lendingManager.lendingPresentation.tabs.project.OrganizationDetails!
According to tron7 we should have an exception when running in this kind of case But there is no exception
The issue is that the snippet is legal JS and the generator shouldn't bomb at all. Changed the summary to reflect that.
Move open issues to RESOLVED â€“ LATER, whose last comment is older than a year.
